date_issue.description: The signing date is 15 days after the service date, which exceeds the 4-6 day compliance window.
date_issue.original_text: Electronically signed by Michelle Craig LCSW at 07/02/2025 11:10 am
date_issue.replacement_text: Electronically signed by Michelle Craig LCSW at 06/21/2025 11:10 am

cpt_issue.description: The CPT code 90791 is correct for an initial visit with a duration of 80 minutes.

goals_issue.description: Two distinct goals are documented with proper formatting and components.
goals_found: Goal #1: "I want to be able to manage my triggers when I'm dealing with anxiety and use healthy coping strategies. I want to be able to express myself instead of shutting down completely."

Goal #2: "I want to have healthy boundaries for myself, within my marriage and with my family members. I want to make sure I don't overcompensate or allow people to make me doubt myself. I want to feel confident in my decision-making."

supervision_issue.description: The 'Rendered by' section does not match the signer. It should be 'Michelle Craig, LCSW'.
